ABOUT_SECT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_SECT.PGPH_2: mainly focused on the React ecosystem. I love building applications and products through clean and maintainable code.
ABOUT_SECT.PGPH_5: , where we are developing web sites for NGOs and foundations that help other people and don't have web presence.

PROJECTS_LIST.title: IKodi
PROJECTS_LIST.description: IKodi is my personal blog, where I share my knowledge writting posts about different tools, technologies and concepts related to the world of web development.

PROJECTS_LIST.title: Full-Stack ToDo app
PROJECTS_LIST.description: The typical ToDo application, but integrating both client and server sides, with users authentication and data persistence with MongoDB.

PROJECTS_LIST.title: Minecraft Clone
PROJECTS_LIST.description: A Minecraft clone based on the freeCodeCamp tutorial, using Three.js (a 2D/3D JavaScript library), React and TypeScript.

PROJECTS_LIST.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
PROJECTS_LIST.description: In this version of the well-known Tic-Tac-Toe, you can play versus the machine, store your points locally to play later, change players colors and some other funny features.

PROJECTS_LIST.title: Connect Four
PROJECTS_LIST.description: My version of the "Connect Four" game, implementing OOP with TypeScript and separating logic from view.

PROJECTS_LIST.title: Crypto Assets
PROJECTS_LIST.description: A simple dashboard to view your crypto address's transactions, with a minimalist design based on Material Design style guidelines.

SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.content: I believe that learning is for life. I love learning from everyone about everything.

SOFT_SKILLS_LIST.content: Change is a good opportunity to see things in perspective and even change your approach.
